name: Witan
description: What would you do if you were accused of being a witch? Would you just accept your fate, or would you fight? Oldskool rpg meets 3d walk/runabout and some other stuff, this is their pretty but deranged child.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel integrated
